Articles.Content:
Have you ever felt that your missions just don't accomplish quite enough? Do you wish you could just get all of that messy "communications satellite array" and "lunar rover" nonsense done in one go? Well now you can!

The Science Comsat Launcher is a revolutionary new all-in-one geosynchronous satellite deployment, Munar semi-synchronous satellite deployment, and Munar exploration mission, all in one compact package! Order yours today!

The .craft file is here. For the love of all that is Kerbal, read the readme if you want this thing to do what it's supposed to do!

Edited September 2, 2013 by SkyRender

Gonna give this one a try, now...

Edited September 2, 2013 by Stone Blue

Ummm...craft file link just displays the above screenshot in a separate tab/window....??

Thank you! I switched it to link to the .zip file proper.
Very cool! I did something similar that had 8 little lander probes.
thanks for sharing, if is also something similar I did a few months ago when I when to Duna with my first Craft,
